subject: Attention:Sir/Madam
body:
Attention:Sir/Madam
The BNP PARIBAS SA of Switzerland have Signed a Bank Draft of $7.5
Million USD in your favor via the instruction of the international
monetary fund (IMF) in view of this,i want you to choose how you want
the Bank Draft Fund to get to you,Either you want us to send it to
your bank account directly for its immediate clearance within 24 hours
because it is an open bank draft or we send it to your home address
for you to receive it and clear it by your self.so let us hear from
you.
If you wish to receive it in your account ,Send us your Banking detail
only with your ID.
Then if you wish to receive it and cash it by your self,send us your
address and your ID with your phone number.
We look forward to hear from you.
Yours in service.
Douglas L. Kennedy
Chief Executive Officer
Commercial Bank of New York
Direct Line +1 928 265 5459

subject: Re:   Attention:Sir/Madam
body:
Dear Douglas L. Kennedy,

Thank you for your email. I would prefer to have the bank draft sent directly to my bank account for immediate clearance. Here are my banking details:

Bank Name: Bank of Latvia
Account Holder: Lewis D. Noogie
Account Number: 1234567890
Swift Code: BKLALV22

Please let me know if you need any further information.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Mark
